midwife if you are worried by 
this.
Ways of coping
• Sometimes it helps to 
share anxieties with other 
pregnant women.
• Discuss any worries, 
concerns or anxieties you 
have with someone you 
feel you can talk to. This 
could be your midwife, 
your partner, your friends 
or family.
Depression and mental 
health problems
It’s normal to have some 
worries while you are pregnant 
and to feel a bit down from 
time to time.
But it is a cause for concern 
if you are feeling down
